title: John Hancock Preferred Income Fund III (HPS) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: John Hancock Preferred Income Fund III ( HPS  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.122 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 30, 2019. Shareholders who purchased HPS prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 18th quarter that HPS has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $19.48, the dividend yield is 7.52%.
The previous trading day's last sale of HPS was $19.48, representing a -0.68% decrease from the 52 week high of $19.61 and a 34.07% increase over the 52 week low of $14.53.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the HPS Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
